typeDescription.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.jwpl.type.ArticleInfo
typeDescription.description: Contains basic information about the article.

featureDescription.name: Authors
featureDescription.description: Number of unique authors of this article

featureDescription.name: Revisions
featureDescription.description: Number of revisions of this article.

featureDescription.name: FirstAppearance
featureDescription.description: The Timestamp of the first appearance of this article.

featureDescription.name: LastAppearance
featureDescription.description: The Timestamp of the last appearance of this article.
